C4r1: In a 14-week clinical study, Fintepla reduced monthy seizures by 79%. This is compared with only 16% for loved one taking placebo. - Which, if any, of the following messages have you heard about Fintepla?

C4r2: Throughout a 36-month, long-term, open-label extension study, most patients maintained the seizure reduction they experienced in the clinical studies. - Which, if any, of the following messages have you heard about Fintepla?
C4r3: In Dravet Syndrome, in clinical studies 50% of patients on FINTEPLA had seizure-free streaks lasting at least 21 days. - Which, if any, of the following messages have you heard about Fintepla?
C4r4: Patients with LGS had significant and maintained seizure reduction across seizure types commonly experienced in LGS. - Which, if any, of the following messages have you heard about Fintepla?

C4r5: Clinical studies show patients experience a reduction in drop seizures across a variety of seizure types (e.g. Generalized tonic-clonic seizures, Tonic seizures, Atonic seizures, Tonic-atonic seizures). - Which, if any, of the following messages hav

C4r6: FINTEPLA fits into your loved one's current antiseizure treatment plan. You don't need to adjust the dose of other antiseizure medications. Add FINTEPLA without potential disruptions or compromising progress with current ASM treatments. - Which, if

C4r7: None of the 603 patients who took FINTEPLA during the clinical studies developed problems with their heart valves that caused valvular heart disease or high blood pressure in the arteries of the lungs, including patients treated for up to 3 years. -
